本当に削除してもよろしいですか？: Are you sure you want to delete?
名前Tooltip: Enter a unique name for this API proxy configuration.
URLTooltip: Enter the target API endpoint URL.
説明Tooltip: Enter a detailed description or usage of this configuration.
ヘッダTooltip: Specify request headers in JSON format (e.g., `{"Authorization": "Bearer token"}`).
利用制限Tooltip: Select the unit for API request rate limiting (e.g., Daily, Weekly).
最大利用回数Tooltip: Enter the maximum number of requests allowed within the specified period.
開始曜日Tooltip: Specify the day of the week to start (reset) the weekly limit.
開始月Tooltip: Specify the month to start (reset) the yearly limit.
開始日Tooltip: Specify the day to start (reset) the monthly or yearly limit.
開始時刻Tooltip: Specify the time to reset the request count.
タイムゾーンTooltip: Select the timezone used for determining the reset timing.
プリセットTooltip: Select a predefined configuration preset if available.
マッピングの有効化Tooltip: Enable to transform (map) the response data structure to fit NocoBase.
レスポンスの種類Tooltip: Select the format of the response data (JSON, CSV, Text).
リストTooltip: Enable if the response contains array (list) data.
リスト要素Tooltip: Specify the JSON path where the array data is located (e.g., `data.items`). Leave empty for root.
一列目が列名Tooltip: Enable if the first row of the CSV data is a header.
リクエストマッピングTooltip: Define rules in JSON to transform NocoBase parameters to API parameters.
レスポンスマッピングTooltip: Define rules in JSON to map API response fields to NocoBase fields.
レスポンスマッピングTooltipJSON: Map response fields to NocoBase fields in JSON (e.g., `{"title": "data.title"}`).
レスポンスマッピングTooltipCSV: Map CSV columns to NocoBase fields in JSON (e.g., `{"title": "0"}`).
レスポンスマッピングTooltipText: Specify field to store the text (e.g., `{"content": "root"}`).
テストパラメータTooltip: Enter sample parameters to use for the connection test.
期待されるレスポンスTooltip: Enter the expected response content to verify the test success.
メソッドTooltip: Select the HTTP method for the API request (GET/POST).
